Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with wait times of up to 25 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 25 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with wait times of up to 20 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Oakley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, 79th, over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, 79th, over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Oakley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero and Addison due to, street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Pulaski, Belmont, Cicero and Addison due to, street blockage near Addison/Pulaski.
